charges.charge_description: 21:860A=ND.F DISTRIBUTE IN OR NEAR SCHOOLS/NARCOTICS - defendant, aided and abetted by each other, did distribute a quantity of cocaine base, "Crack", within 1,000 feet of a housing facility owned by the Monahans Public Housing Authority in violation of Title 21, USC 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(C) and 860, and Title 18, USC 2.(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 12 months and 1 day imprisonment, 6 years supervised release, special assessment fee of $100.00 imposed

charges.charge_description: 21:860A=ND.F DISTRIBUTE IN OR NEAR SCHOOLS/NARCOTICS - defendant, aided and abetted by each other, did distribute a quantity of cocaine base, "Crack", within 1,000 feet of a housing facility owned by the Monahans Public Housing Authority in violation of Title 21, USC 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(C) and 860, and Title 18, USC 2.(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 13 months imprisonment, 6 years supervised release, special assessment fee of $100.00 imposed
